com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.boundarymatch
Class SegmentProjecter

java.lang.Object
  com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.boundarymatch.SegmentProjecter
public class SegmentProjecter
extends java.lang.Object

Computes the projection of a target segment onto a reference segment. It will snap the computed projection to the endpoints of the reference segment if they are with the tolerance distance.

Constructor Summary
SegmentProjecter(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineSegment seg, com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineSegment ref, double distanceTolerance)
          Creates a new segment which is the snapped projection of the seg onto the ref segment.

SegmentProjecter

public SegmentProjecter(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineSegment seg,
                        com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineSegment ref,
                        double distanceTolerance)
Creates a new segment which is the snapped projection of the seg onto the ref segment.

Parameters:
seg - the target seg to be projected
ref - the reference segment to project onto
distanceTolerance - the snapping tolerance
Method Detail

snap

public static com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate snap(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate coord,
                                                          com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineSegment seg,
                                                          double tolerance)
"Snap" a coordinate to one or other end of a segment if it is within the tolerance. The coordinate is snapped to the closest endpoint.

getCoordinate

public com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate getCoordinate(int index)
The index'th coordinate of the resulting projected segment

Parameters:
index - 0 or 1
Returns:
a Coordinate

isEndPointImage

public boolean isEndPointImage(int index)
Determines whether the index'th endpoint of the projected segment is the image of an endpoint of the parent segment

Parameters:
index - 0 or 1
Returns:
true if the endpoint is the image of a parent endpoint
